author: vors
body:
There are few people, who are working simultaneously on adding new dlls to the build.

Current [mapping](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/workflow/mapping.md) process is not suitable for that case: it uses single `mappings.json` file which makes it hard to isolate porting new assemlbies.
### Proposed changes
- Split `mappings.json` into `mappings.json` for every project (folder under `src`)
- Throw away `src\monad` prefix, now it's not relevant
- Make `Copy-SubmoduleFiles` flexible about set of `mappings.json` that it uses
- Add checks to `Copy-SubmoduleFiles` to avoid copying wrong versions of files.
title: Enhancements for files mapping
